summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Twenty Five Dollars ($25.00) out of the General Fund of The City of Seattle to pay the claim of Samuel J. Carsonfor personal injuries received while walking on Railroad Avenue in The City of Seattle, on the sidewalk on the west side of said street, between Columbia and Marion Streets, on the 13th day of September, 1911 and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
